dialogues.text: A few yards into the fissure, the walls become smooth, l tell-tale STONE FORMATIONS.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (re: stonework.) Incan. Early 16th century. Look how perfect the seams are... The gently-sloping path is abruptly closed off with an im

dialogues.speaker: STONE
dialogues.text: SLAB. Lara scans the area and notices a WALL LEVER.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Not much choice, is there? Carlos shakes his head warily as Lara pulls the lever. Un grind, portending trouble. But finally, the slab slides o way ...revealing a small ANTECHAMBER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara cautiously leads Carlos into the non-descript room. Carlos steps on the center tile... SLAAAAM! The stone slab shuts behind them. Flare in hand, quickly searches the room. No lever anywhere. But there are NOTCH into the wall...

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: This way! Lara pulls Carlos back against the wall without notches a floor slides open beneath them...but only halfway!

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: An airlock. Very ingenious.

dialogues.speaker: CARLOS
dialogues.text: Air lock?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Like a submarine. This cavern used to be at the bottom of a lake. Had to keep the water out. Lara peers down the vertical shaft below them. With the can see a few more NOTCHED STEPS in the stone wall...but the been destroyed by another FISSURE.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Can't climb down... Lara drops the flare down the shaft to gauge its depth. A yards before -- Fssssst. The flare hits a pool of water and ext

dialogues.speaker: CARLOS
dialogues.text: I don't swim.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: No problem. I always come prepared. Lara hooks a wire from her BELT WINCH to a PITON, then lo piton into her compression assembly pistol. Firing the piton in shaft ceiling, Lara steps off the antechamber's half-floor and beside Carlos.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let me get down a ways, then grab onto the cable yourself. Carlos nods apprehensively, watching as Lara lowers herse into the shaft, scanning the walls with her FLASHLIGHT. S his fear, Carlos reaches for and grabs hold of the cable...sl lowering himself down behind Lara. Lara's flashlight exposes a series of HIEROGLYPHICS carve shaft. They appear to be a warning of some kind. Showing that will cut in half any tomb raiders who venture down the sh without stepping in one particular notch...which Lara realizes sh already passed.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh dear. Suddenly, CROSS-CUTTING BLADES slide from the shaft wall several places...nearly decapitating Carlos and almost severing L legs! Their cable cut, they both plummet the last 20 yards into below, screaming all the way down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara and Carlos SPLASH down then quickly break up through surface of a small reservoir. Carlos splashes around, no swimmer. stands, showing the water only comes to her chest.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: There's a step here. But as Carlos paddles onto the step, Lara's flashlight re of dozens of BEADY EYES surrounding them.

dialogues.speaker: CARLOS
dialogues.text: (with dread) Rats.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Aim for the eyes. The chamber is quickly filled with the ECHOES OF GUNFIRE and Carlos ascend the underwater steps, shooting rats when th close. The steps lead to:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FOLLOW Lara and Carlos as they enter a stunning, vast sub cavern housing towering GOLDEN STATUES and TWO GOLD-ADORN

dialogues.speaker: MAUSOLEUMS
dialogues.text: built squarely in the middle of the chamber, facing one a

dialogues.speaker: CARLOS
dialogues.text: El Dorado?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Just the tip of the iceberg, if we're lucky. Lara cracks a couple FLARES and tosses them throughout, illuminating the chamber in an eerie orange glow. Carlos walks with a a HALF-PUMA/HALF-MAN STATUE with EMERALD EYES -- Lara grabs before he touches one of the jewels.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Careful, Carlos. We're intruders here. Anything could be a trap. Lara walks cautiously to the center of the chamber, stand between the two mausoleum entrances.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Looks like a royal burial chamber for the last Incan king, Manco. With her flashlight Lara examines the two different STATU each mausoleum.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Theses statues represent two of the primary gods of the Inca religion. Mama Kilya, the mother moon; and Ilyapa, the thunder god. Carlos joins Lara, peering nervously down the ominous sta leading into one of the mausoleums.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'd wager that Manco's wife is guarded by Kilya, and his firstborn son sleeps under Ilyapa.

dialogues.speaker: CARLOS
dialogues.text: Where is Manco? Lara turns her flashlight on an enormous pair of DOUBLE D the far back wall. Above the double doors is an immense GOLDE carved into the stone.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: That sun represents Inti, the sun god. My guess is Manco is buried behind those doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hopeful) Maybe El Dorado is behind there, too.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Could be. Certainly, no need to disturb these other tombs... Carlos follows Lara back towards the massive double doors stops him with a warning hand.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Better stay back. I have a feeling they haven't rolled out the red carpets for us. Lara tosses Carlos her backpack, then slowly approaches t to Manco's tomb, which appear to be hermetically sealed. Car both doors are KEYHOLES.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Knife, please. Carlos pulls a KNIFE from Lara's backpack and flips it to Biting her lip in concentration, Lara tries to jimmy one of the keyholes... until the floor beneath her feet starts to pivot! Carlos in fear. Maintaining her composure, Lara skids down the now-angled of floor...turns and STABS HER KNIFE into the floor, holding both hands as the floor continues to rotate.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: The sub-chamber is filled with SKELETONS impaled on BLOOD

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: As the floor rotates, Lara dangles inches above the jagge her grip on the dagger slipping...one hand falling away...but floor rotates back to its original position and resets i Sparing Lara the fate of many unprepared tomb raiders before her.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That was fun. Jaw dropped, Carlos remembers to breathe again.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Looks like we have to pay a visit to mommy and junior after all. See about some keys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carlos nervously follows Lara down the narrow stairs.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: I've found that traps usually reflect how the entombed lived...and died. Manco's son, Prince Tupac Amaru, was killed by Spanish Conquistadors. He was beheaded then burned at the stake.

dialogues.speaker: CARLOS
dialogues.text: (gulp) I'll wait here. Carlos wisely stops midway down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stepping down off the final stair, her eyes wide and aler enters Tupac's tomb with only a FLASHLIGHT. The rectangul appears harmless: an ornately carved SARCOPHAGUS raised o pedestal. One more step, though, and the stairs behind he retract into the wall with a resounding THUD! Carlos is kneeled at the edge of the stairs where there i
drop down into the tomb.

dialogues.speaker: CARLOS
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Fine. Just get a rope ready. That  can't be the worst of it. As Carlos pulls a ROPE from Lara's backpack, Lara notices

dialogues.speaker: BLACK
dialogues.text: LIQUID is oozing up into the room from a sub-area previou blocked by the stairs. Lara inspects the liquid.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oil... Better hurry with that rope, Carlos! Lara hops up onto the stone pedestal to keep away from th oil, which curiously stops flowing once the room is covered wi foot layer of the black ooze. Not sure what to make of this, Lara returns to the task a Using all her strength, Lara pushes the heavy lid of the sarcop inside of which she finds A BEJEWELED KEY resting on the mummified chest. But when Lara takes the key...the sarcophagus starts to l the oil! INSERT SHOT: FLINT STONES on the back of the sarcophagus wall and SPARK as it lowers. THE TOMB BURSTS INTO FLAMES! Lara instinctively leaps for Carlos has lowered from the edge of the stairs...just cat with her fingertips! Lara scrambles up the rope -- which is burning behind her STONE SLATS slide closed from both sides of the stairwell is sealing itself up like a kiln...with Lara in it! Carlo hold of the rope and pulls Lara to safety just the tomb seals Again, Carlos is emotionally spent.

dialogues.speaker: CARLOS
dialogues.text: Don't say that was fun.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Mildly diverting. (teasing Carlos) Can't wait to see what mommy's got  in store for us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara and Carlos exit the Prince's tomb and walk 20' strai to the Queen's tomb entrance.

dialogues.speaker: CARLOS
dialogues.text: I hate to ask but...how did the Queen die?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: You'll want to wait on the stairs. Trust me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This time Lara descends the stairs more carefully while C watches on from midway up. With every step, Lara scans the walls, floor, the ceiling. When she reaches the bottom of the steps, sh expects the stairs to retract again...but they don't. The Queen's SARCOPHAGUS is set in a RECTANGULAR DEPRESSIO floor against the far wall. Lara is now faced with a long across the room, her every step echoing ominously. Sweat starts her forehead as Lara searches vainly for a sign of the tr come... Finally, Lara reaches the depression and gently climbs do the sarcophagus. She drops to her knees and inspects ever the coffin: no signs of a trap. So Lara cautiously tests the lid, which is carved in the beautiful woman --

dialogues.speaker: -- SPIKES SHOOT FROM THE HANDS, EYES, AND MOUTH ON THE LI
dialogues.text: itself then springs upright on its lateral hinge, right a Lara...who jumps backwards against the depression wall just enough s spikes stop millimeters from her torso and face! Suddenly, loud GRINDING can be heard behind the main tomb walls...which now start closing in above Lara! A quick ch distance back to the stairs tells Lara she'll never make being squashed...or sealed into the rectangular depressi Queen's mummy! So Lara MULE-KICKS the sarcophagus lid above the hinge... cracks and sends the lid smashing back onto its resting place at sarcophagus. Now Lara runs to the back of the sarcophagus and slides t forward...until it teeters on the front edge of the sarco then tilts to the floor. This leaves one end of the lid pointe ceiling (just above the lip of the depression) and the ot the lid touching the floor. In a flash -- with the tomb side walls getting closer eac Lara grabs the second KEY from the Queen's mummy, then ho the tilted lid, climbs out of the rectangular depression and run for it across the main tomb floor. REACTION SHOT: Carlos has his hands over his eyes, watchi his fingers as: The walls continue to close in tighter. But moments befor crushed...the walls stop! Lara looks back, pleased to see raised end of the sarcophagus lid has stopped the walls from clo further. Her plan worked -- -- CRUUUUUUNCH! The lid BUCKLES and CRACKS under the extr pressure. The walls lurch to life again! Lara starts running...the path back to the stairs getting narrow...forcing Lara to run side-step now... CU - THE SARCOPHAGUS LID is about to be pulverized! Lara senses the end and executes a mid-air TWIST/REVERSE sticking her landing three steps below Carlos just as the

dialogues.speaker: SLAM
dialogues.text: together. Carlos shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: CARLOS
dialogues.text: You are not human.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take that as a compliment. Lara leans over to dust herself off, but finds she can't: have closed on the end of her ponytail.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Knife, please. Carlos flips her the knife again. Then he watches Lara cu free, losing an inch or two of hair.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Needed a trim anyway. As they start up the stairs, Carlos walking backwards, ra nervously to Lara as she ascends with him.

dialogues.speaker: CARLOS
dialogues.text: I never seen anything like this. All these traps. And still the King's tomb to go. How can we ever make it to El Dorado?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: As long as we stick together we just might get out of here alive. As they reach the top of the steps leading back to the Ma Room. Carlos stops, gasps.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Carlos? Carlos slumps forward, shot from behind! Lara props up hi body for a moment, then ducks as the mausoleum wall ERUPTS und silenced sniper fire. Lara grabs back the pistol she lent Carlos and unholsters After she pulls on her backpack, Lara makes the sign of t over Carlos! body.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Rest in peace, my friend.  Then she sprints out of the Queen's tomb...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dodging a flurry of BULLETS, Lara runs and shoots her gun

dialogues.speaker: DIVES
dialogues.text: and ROLLS behind the Prince's tomb. TWO AUSSIE SNIPERS co shoot in her direction, Lara puts down her guns and takes

dialogues.speaker: AIRTANK/
dialogues.text: FLAMETHROWER from her backpack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luiz's CORPSE laying on its back in the brush. REVEAL - DODGE staring down at his former Boatman with a of frustration.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Why do they never listen to me? Dodge hears FOOTFALLS in the jungle. Larsen and two other approaching. He takes one last look up towards Lake Guara mutters:

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Good luck, Lara. You're gonna need it. As Dodge starts jogging back towards the Napo river, we g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The AUSSIE SNIPERS walk out of the shadows searching for Their WALKIE TALKIES squelches to life.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (over walkie) I heard shots. Talk to me.

dialogues.speaker: AUSSIE
dialogues.text: I dropped the monkeyman. Now it's the girl's turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll let you know when it's safe. The two snipers hear a HISSING noise and see the flickeri of a controlled flame on one side of the Prince's mausoleum. T approach the light from opposite sides and leap out of hiding simu and FIRE -- -- THE AIRTANK EXPLODES INTO FIERY METAL SHARDS! Taking o Aussie snipers. A beat. Then Lara drops down from atop th mausoleum, landing next to the dead men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WALKIE-TALKIE in hand, Malvern stands over the fissure, p down into the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: What happened!? Cutler! Garrett!

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (over walkie) Next time don't send boys to do a girl's work. Off Malvern's incredulous face, we go;

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The massive double doors CREAK open revealing Lara, a loo anticipation on her face. We are:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara walks into an impossibly beautiful GROTTO with a mas vaulted ceiling, the centerpiece of which is a shallow REFLECTING surrounded by a dozen pillars at least two stories high - -- WHUUUMP! The double doors have slammed shut behind Lar On the far side of the grotto Lara finds an ornate entra blocked by solid gold SUN RAYS. But the gaps between rays are not enough to crawl through. So Lara pulls out her VIDEO PROBE with CONTROL DEVICE (and mini view screen). Activating the air powered probe, Lara sends it floating inside the dark burial cham CU - REMOTE MINI-SCREEN: Inscribed on all the walls are P telling of Manco's great deeds. Depictions of wars won, i amounts of gold amassed. One painting shows Manco holding VASE-LIKE OBJECT from which gold seems to flow. Another p finds Manco praying before the black, vase-like object set atop SHRINE. Lara navigates the probe over to the centerpiece of Manco chamber: a round, solid gold SARCOPHAGUS. A spiral of HIE particularly interests Lara, who starts feeding the image laptop database. She mentally translates the message on t sarcophagus...

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: You fooled us all, didn't you, Manco? Suddenly, the whole grotto RUMBLES. Lara spins around to water in the reflecting pool is splashing over the sides! grotto is filling up at an astonishing rate. Lara shoves the probe and laptop into her waterproof back runs to the center of the grotto, scanning the walls with FLASHLIGHT for a possible escape route. Nothing. Lara tries to shimmy up one of the columns, but it's too she slips back down...into water already neck deep!

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Could've used that air tank about now. As the water level swiftly rises, carrying Lara closer to ceiling, JAGGED SPIKES extend from the ceiling!

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Got to be a way out... (revelation) Or a way in. Seconds from death by impaling, Lara takes a deep breath to the center of the reflecting pool...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara searches for and finds a NARROW INLET through which water is flowing into the grotto. Barely able to fit, Lara sque inside, FLASHLIGHT illuminating the way...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara is swimming right at us, sloping upwards now. Her ey with fear as her lungs begin to shrink. Determination turns to desperation as she abandons the flashlight to stroke with both hands. and faster...into darkness...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gasping for air, Lara bursts up through the surface of th recognizable by the missing WEDGE in one side. Malvern has abandoned the diving platform and pulled up s Lara paddles for the shore...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: CU - THE BELL-BOEING ENGINE is missing the interrupter ca integral part of the ignition system) that Lara stole.

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Bitch wants to strand us out here. We are:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Larsen slams down the engine hatch. Malvern shakes his he ahead of the game.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't disable the ignition to strand us. You do it because you need a way back yourself. No one else seems to follow Malvern's logic, including Au and #2, their exposed skin peppered with swollen ANT BITES.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Clear out the camp. Let's see if our little rat takes the bait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara climbs down the moderate incline, stopping beneath a tree. She squeezes her hair out and re-braids it into a p then pulls out a pair of CUSTOMIZED NIGHT GOGGLES from her bac Scanning the valley below:

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (THROUGH GOGGLES)
dialogues.text: First point of interest: the Napo river where Dodge dropp off. The trawler is no longer moored near the rapids. Scanning up river, Lara spots Dodge's vessel half-way back to Francis Orellana. Lara PANS the goggles to Malvern's base camp, which looks invitingly deserted. Until Lara flicks on the THERMAL-VIEW FILTER...illuminating FIVE BODY-HEAT AURAS, lurking in a near-perfect perimeter the camp.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lara smirks as she removes the goggles.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Planning a little ambush, are we? From her backpack, Lara removes a SPREAD PIN. Loading it compression assembly pistol, Lara takes aim on a tree dir across from her by 50 meters -- a tree with roots planted right Bell-Boeing. The spread pin shoots silently to the treetop and catches branch "Vv." Lara ties off the wire end to her cinchona tree. Us TROLLEY, Lara starts the long, precarious journey from tr tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Larsen is once again reading Cosmo, this time tallying hi total on a questionnaire:

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: (reads analysis) "Buy him some Viagra, he needs help!?" (tosses magazine) Stinking rag. Twenty feet above him, Lara shimmies along stealthily unt INSERT SHOT: The spread pin pulls through the branch "V." Lara drops five feet as the wire goes slack, then taut ag spread pin re-catches in another "V." Now Lara's dangling hands only, clinging to the hand trolley. Directly below her, Larsen stands, alerted. Fingers on th trigger, Larsen looks every direction but up. Lara gracefully regains her shimmy position and continues the tree unseen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara descends the tree, placing her ten feet from the Bel Scampering over to the plane, she quietly raises the engi and replaces the INTERRUPTER CAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara straps herself into her seat and reaches for the ign keys aren't there. Thinking quickly, she pulls her night goggles back out a scanning the base camp.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Inside one of the tents across the camp, Lara ZOOMS IN on KEYS with a "BB" insignia laying on the MAP TABLE.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Ah-ha.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lara puts away the night goggles and removes the REMOTE P Picking through her backpack, she finds what she needs: another s Cramming it into the hemispherical ridge on the probe, La improvises a HOOK ATTACHMENT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The probe zips across the camp towards the map tent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara watches the MINI VIEW SCREEN as she manipulates the CONTROL DEVICE. She maneuvers the probe to hook up the ke them on the spread pin...but drops them onto a metal HALI

dialogues.speaker: -- CHAAAANG
dialogues.text: Malvern and his men all tense up, bring guns to the ready

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: (into walkie) Where'd that noise come from?

dialogues.speaker: AUSSIE
dialogues.text: (over walkie) One of the tents.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: (into walkie) Let's close in. Slowly.  As the Aussies all tighten their perimeter... Lara bites her lower lip in concentration as she tries to the keys. Out of the corner of her eyes she can see the Aussi emerging one-by-one from the jungle. One last try and the keys are hooked on the probe. But as steers the probe back towards the cockpit, a warning light flash remote control: "COMPRESSION LOW." Outside, the probe falters, the compressed air-jets not m as fast now... Malvern spots the probe -- and the keys -- heading toward Bell- Boeing. Malvern OPENS FIRE, prompting everyone to unload clips. The probe spins around drunkenly, its jet assembly damage leans precariously out of the cockpit, briefly exposing h Aussie gunfire, and reaches for the probe. She grabs the as the probe falls to the ground!

dialogues.speaker: STOP HER
dialogues.text: But as they close in -- WHOOOOOSH! Malvern and his men ar by JET WASH from the Bell-Boeing 609. All the Aussies but Ma fire again... Lara deliberately throws the plane into a 360@ ground spin...sending the Aussies diving for cover...giving her just enough tim space to ascend vertically from the jungle clearing. FIND Malvern at a CRATE assembling a SURFACE TO AIR MISSI Larsen spots the probe Lara left behind. Picking it up, h to the camera lens.

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: Listen up you wench...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara peers down at the MINI VIEW SCREEN which is on the s between her legs. Larsen's ugly mug appears as a static-filled tr on the remote display.

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: (on view screen) We've got a little surprise for you. Larsen points the probe-cam over at Malvern, who fires th Lara looks out the window of the plane:

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: THE MISSILE swerves through the sky right at her!

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lara quickly searches the control panel, finally locating LEVER, which she pulls back. The cockpit canopy BURSTS open and Lara is jettisoned int night sky, still strapped into her seat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she tumbles away from the plane, the missile connects Bell-Boeing...which EXPLODES IN MID-AIR! A PARACHUTE deploys from the top of Lara's seat...and she slowly into the dark jungle below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Malvern watches the distant explosion as he tunes in a fr his SHORT-WAVE RADIO.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: (into radio) Send in my chopper -- you've got our coordinates. And bring all the ammo we've got left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A sleek black HUEY CHOPPER takes off from the deck of a l shipping vessel outfitted with WHALING EQUIPMENT (harpoon guns, ne On the side of the ship -- and the chopper -- the name "SEAP is accompanied by a WHITE WHALE LOGO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The small town is ablaze. SMOKE clouds the main street wh and Aussie #3 beat the snot out of a LOCAL while Malvern with mild interest.

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: You thought you saw her?! Now what the hell good does that do us? Larsen kicks the Local a few more times for good measure.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: Why don't you jog his memory. Larsen flicks on his GOLD LIGHTER. Aussie #3 holds a MOLO

dialogues.speaker: COCKTAIL
dialogues.text: under Larsen's lighter, igniting the chemical bomb. Again Local's pleas, Aussie #3 hurls the cocktail into the Cant

dialogues.speaker: FLAMES
dialogues.text: erupt. REVEAL - DODGE watching this inquisition from a safe dist wanting to intervene, but powerless to do so. Head down, the street into his shanty office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pulling his leather coat off a wall hook, Dodge stuffs it already packed DUFFEL BAG.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I found it. Dodge whirls, BOWIE KNIFE in hand and ready to throw...un sees Lara stepping from the shadows! Still beautiful but wear the jungle on her clothes and in her hair.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (distressed) Are you crazy!? Didn't you see what Malvern's doing to this town looking for you -- (realizes) You found what?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: El Dorado. But it doesn't mean "Golden City" like everyone thinks. It means "Golden Man."

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Look, I don't have time to play word games with you. I've got to get out of here... Dodge grabs up his duffel bag. As he exits:

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I take it Carlos and Luiz didn't make it? Lara steps in front of Dodge, blocking his path. Their bo almost touching.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: No. But they did help me get inside Manco's tomb. He's the Golden Man, Dodge.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: So you solved the mystery of El Dorado. Bully for you. Doesn't mean squat if you're dead. (beat) I'm leaving. You should too.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Wait. There's something else...the source of all the Incan gold. This gets Dodge's attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There were directions to another sacred place high in the Andes, south of here. That's where King Manco kept "The Black Veil," which either located gold...or created it.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (thinks about it but...) I told you before, Lara, it's alla wild goose chase. Forget it. He moves away from her, checks out the window: Larsen and are working over another couple LOCALS.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: They're working their way down the street... (turns back) Do you have any idea who Malvern is? I made a few calls, and you can forget all that money he's throwing around. His whaling business is bankrupt. He's a desperate man, Lara. He's got nothing to lose. Lara takes a deep breath to utter uncomfortable words:

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: I need you, Dodge. I need your help. This stops Dodge from exiting the back door.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: You managed to do in one day what I wasn't able to do in ten years. What the hell do you need me for?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: I've got Manco's secret, but Malvern's got me trapped. (beat) I don't want my name on that impressive list of yours. Just get me out of town, and up to the mountains, and I'll give you what Darby offered me: a 50-50 split. Mulling it over, Dodge sneaks another peek out the windo

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: What shape was Manco's sarcophagus?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Round. Like the sun. Dodge nods, knowing this to be truth. After a long moment

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: I must be crazy as the rest of you 50-50. He extends his hand. They shake, holding onto each other little longer than necessary.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh, I almost forgot... He goes to the curtained-off closet and slides out a smal CRATE.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This came for you today.

dialogues.speaker: CU
dialogues.text: This 4x4 crate, marked "via messenger", is addressed to L care of Nathaniel Dodge. Lara uses Dodge's BOWIE KNIFE to lid off of the crate. We are:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While Dodge steers the trawler down the Napo without the the noisy inboard motor, Lara digs through the excelsior- crate, finding a neatly packaged (in brown paper and string) CHA CLOTHES.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: How convenient. Lara digs further, finding a small, portable REFRIGERATIO (used for organ transportation.) Inside, cloaked in frosty air finds an EGG AND PICKLE SANDWICH and a CARIBBEAN CRUISE BROCHUR note: "Who knows, it might get hijacked. That could be fu Karak."

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You've got to be kidding me... Lara bites happily into the sandwich.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Bite?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Egg and pickles? Pass. Lara puts down the sandwich and picks up the clothes.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Someplace I can change?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Yeah. The master suite. He jerks a thumb at a curtained area in the rear of the c pulls back the curtain, revealing a grungy bunk and a rus

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: How charming. Dodge waits for Lara to disappear behind the closed curta grabs up the note.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Who's Karak?

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Oh, just the man I live with. Dodge glances back at the curtain. The single light above casts an enticing SILHOUETTE of Lara as she disrobes.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Sounds serious.

dialogues.speaker: BEHIND THE CURTAIN
dialogues.text: Lara snuggles into a form-fitting Lycra top.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Quite. Karak's much older. Very wise, very distinguished. Frankly, I'm lucky to have him. She's smiling, knowing how this must sound.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: I'm surprised he let you come down here by yourself. I know I wouldn't.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: And why is that?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (after a beat) I'd hate to miss all the fun. Lara emerges from behind the curtain, zipping up her very flattering new shorts.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Good answer. Dodge gives her new outfit a once-over.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: I feel overdressed. FLASHLIGHT BEAMS criss-cross over the trawler. Dodge duck pulls Lara down with him.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Must be Malvern.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Hope you've got a plan B.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: I prefer to improvise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Malvern and the Aussies stand on top of the sloping Napo FLASHLIGHTS searching the trawler, which drifts silently circles.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: Search it. The two Aussies make running leaps from the bank onto the deck of the trawler.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: First one to find the girl gets five minutes alone with her. Then I want every cent she's cost me back in blood.

dialogues.speaker: REAR OF THE TRAWLER
dialogues.text: Dodge and Lara float in the water, covertly lowering a cr carved CANOE from the back of the boat. He whispers:

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Turn it over. Lara is confused for a moment, until she sees: the bottom canoe has been painted to resemble a log.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Fools the banditos eyery time. Lara smiles, impressed.

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON THE TRAWLER
dialogues.text: The two Aussies make a mess of the cabin, finding Lara's clothes. Aussie #5 steps outside, reports to Malvern:

dialogues.speaker: AUSSIE
dialogues.text: They're gone, but they were here. Unconvinced, Malvern shines his flashlight on the river, the two Aussies to do the same. One of the flashlight beams f the overturned canoe, which looks remarkably like a floating

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara and Dodge wade through the murky water, along with D floating duffel. Their shallow breathing echoes as the fl beams cut through the water all around them.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (whispers; sarcastic) Of course the nice thing about this plan is that if they open fire, we'll be dead instantly.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (whispers back) That's if the piranha don't get us first.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE BANKS
dialogues.text: The two Aussies jump back to the river bank and rejoin Ma Aussie #5 hands the CRATE LID to Malvern, who shines his flashli illuminating the name "Lara Croft." Malvern hands the lid

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: I want all the dirt on Ms. Croft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara and Dodge canoe up to Dodge's SEAPLANE, which is hid vegetation overhanging the edges of the tributary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dodge and Lara toss their bags into the back of the four- Dodge fires up the ignition, setting the propellers in fitful motion...until they stop.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: You need me to get out and push?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (pointed) I think best when it's quiet. He drops his head between Lara's legs, nosing around und dash.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Bit forward, aren't we? Fiddling with wires, Dodge sets the props back into actio

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Hey, it's our second date, right?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Date's over. I see flashlights. Sure enough, oncoming FLASHLIGHT BEAMS streak through the Dodge ignores them, concentrating instead on taxiing the seapla onto the Napo. As the flashlights draw closer and brighter, Dodge points seaplane up river where the vegetation is less dense. UZI GUNFIRE the night sky as Dodge throttles the seaplane down the watery

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (to plane) Come on, honey. Come on. As the plane finds some lift, Lara is the first to spot t obstacle.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Naturally you accounted for this.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Naturally.

dialogues.speaker: BOTH LARA
dialogues.text: The trawler still floats in circles upstream, completely their river runway!

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Amidst gunfire, as a collision appears imminent, Dodge RO

dialogues.speaker: PLANE
dialogues.text: SIDEWAYS...just missing the trawler and several shorelin Lara opens her eyes and resumes breathing.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (slightly shaken) That brought back memories.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With uzi fire still blazing around him, Malvern watches t seaplane lights recede into the night sky. He gestures to Larsen a to suppress their fire -- oddly, all the Aussies have been f their uzis into the jungle.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: (grins) Worked like a charm. He activates a REMOTE TRACKING DEVICE which shows a small

dialogues.speaker: OSCILLOSCOPE
dialogues.text: radar display of the seaplane's location.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the underside of the seaplane, a RED LIGHT blinks on a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oblivious to the tracking device, Lara types on her lapto

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: The suspense is killing me. Where're we headed? CU - LARA'S COMPUTER displays video footage taken inside tomb. Lara FREEZE FRAMES on the carvings atop the sarcophagus.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: These hieroglyphics imply the Black Veil is hidden in Machu Picchu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not a chance. That place has been picked clean. Dodge leans over for a look at the laptop imagery.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look at that sarcophagus. That's my old trust fund. With interest. Lara feels the seaplane start to drift and tilt.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Watch the drool. Eyes on the sky. Lara isolates a section of hieroglyphics and instructs th to "translate." As the new text begins to scroll:

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We're looking for a city the Incas called "Bed of Gold." That's where we'll find the Veil shrine. Dodge shoots Lara an astonished look.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Not bed, cradle. Choquaquirao. Means "cradle of gold." 50 miles from Machu Picchu. No more than 20 people have ever made it up there.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Wanna make it 22? Off Dodge's consenting smile, we;

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the sun rises above the semi-tropical flatlands, Dodge seaplane appears over the trees, banking over the Apurimac gorge. aircraft glides down into the narrow chasm, skipping along the fas waters before docking at the lone beachhead on one of the banks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dodge looks at Lara, who is taking a peaceful catnap in t passenger seat. Cutting the engine, Dodge stares at her for a momen glimpsing the young girl beneath the tough exterior. Lara him staring and blinks awake.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (groggy smile) I was just dreaming that we found what we're looking for.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: From your lips to God's ears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAN from the majestic mountaintop of Nevado Panta, obscur mist, down a near 90@ sheer face encumbered by thousands of jag STOP on Dodge's slack-jawed face.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: I guess this is a bad time to mention my fear of heights. Dodge turns at the sound of TINK-TINK-TINK: it's Lara pou piton into the mountain face.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: The real problem's going to be this metamorphic rock. She tests the piton, which loosens as the rock crumples.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: You don't understand. I can't do this, Lara. Lara removes some ROPE & CARABINERS from her backpack.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Of course you can. I used to be  terrified of elevators. My father's trick was keeping my mind off the moment. Dodge pulls a half-empty BOTTLE OF SCOTH from his duffel.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Your father was a smart man. As Dodge takes a swig, Lara fires a spread pin high up on mountain face.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: We'll talk about anything. Except what we're doing. Just look up and stay positive. Lara fastens the rope from above to her belt winch.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'll take lead and secure your guide line. All you have to do is hold on.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: I thought we weren't gonna talk about this?

dialogues.speaker: FURTHER UP THE MOUNTAIN
dialogues.text: Dodge careens into the frame, the gusting winds swinging end of his rope like a pendulum.

dialogues.speaker: AHHHHHHHHHHH
dialogues.text: The winds die down for a moment, allowing Dodge to regain the rock face. Lara calls down to him:

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Favorite movie!?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Anything with Buster Keaton! Up above him, Lara is in her element. Eagle eyes unblinki carefully searches each crag for the perfect grab or toe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Want to know mine!? The wind pushes Dodge drifting again.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Not really!

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: "Vertigo!" Lara lowers down to Dodge's side.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Only teasing. This offers no comfort to Dodge, who looks seasick. Lara his carabiner to a new guide line.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Relax. I can almost see the top. The winds bump their bodies together, causing friction.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Do you know what the worst part is? How much you're enjoying this.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: I've tried it scared. Not as much fun. As Lara ascends, Dodge is buffeted again by the winds, th spinning him around several times. INSERT SHOT: Dodge's anchor pin starts to pull from the s Lara traverses a difficult outcropping by moving hand-ove until she finds purchase for her foot. Just as she reaches the large, overgrown plateau with RUINS... INSERT SHOT: Dodge's anchor pin pulls from the stone. Dodge yells as he FREE FALLS down the mountain face! Lara sees what's coming and tries to brace herself -- PRI Dodge's guide line goes taut and starts to pull Lara down Sliding back over the edge, Lara somehow manages to brac legs spread wide -- catching a rock with each foot. Dodge jerks to a stop! His guide line belt SNAPPING A BUC busting open...leaving Dodge dangling by his hands! He no the mistake of looking down at the dizzying height.

dialogues.speaker: HANG ON, DODGE
dialogues.text: Lara frantically re-secures Dodge's guide line around an rock. Once done, Lara flips her carabiner onto Dodge's guide wi begins rappelling down the mountain face. Covering 20 yards between each touch, Lara almost appears flying. Glancing down, she sees Dodge swinging wildly in

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Here I come! Timing her last rappel perfectly, Lara propels herself la well...swinging at Dodge just as his own swing reaches it Like an acrobat, Lara scoops up Dodge in one arm -- he re belt and grabs onto her tightly. Together they swing, spinning in the wind like dancers on cloud... across the mountain face until Lara catches a crag with h and brings their thrill ride to an end. Their resulting embrace couldn't be any more intimate. Th no closer together. This shared near-death moment has left b them breathless with a nearly post-coital bliss.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So was that good for you?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Not good enough to try it again.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (smirks)  Maybe on the way back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Malvern's BLACK HUEY HELICOPTER sets down next to Dodge's on the beachhead. Malvern is the first one out this time, an increasing desperation noticeable in his actions. Malvern rummages around inside the plane cabin but finds interest. Using the binoculars around his neck, Malvern s scanning the mountainous countryside...

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (THROUGH BINOCULARS)
dialogues.text: We PAN past a ROPE dangling down the Nevado Panta. WHIP P then up, up, up. Just in time to see Lara and Dodge, barely visible throug mist, cresting the plateau ridge onto Choquequirao.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Malvern lowers the binoculars and strides back to the Hue

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: Where?

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: (points) All the way to the top. Larsen's gaze follows Malvern's finger all the way up to mountain in the mist.

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: Holy shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At 6,000 feet the view from this majestic promontory is breathtaking. Lara stands at the very edge of the plateau staring down awash in distant memories.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: So where's this famous shrine? Slowly, Lara turns to find Dodge rooting around some over

dialogues.speaker: RUINS
dialogues.text: nestled just below the highest Nevado Panta peak.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: "Cause this sure as hell ain't it.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: If I understand the computer translation correctly, it's directly beneath us. We're supposed to use the "Stairway from the Stars."

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: You can't mean those. Dodge points to a 15 foot high flight of GIANT, CRUMBLING which lead to nothing.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It's below us but the stairs go up? Must be some Incan practical joke. With a clarity of vision, Lara walks towards the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: It's not a joke. It's a secret. You don't see the combination to Fort Knox posted on the net, do you?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, but I thought you had all this figured out. I thought that's why I just went ten rounds with death back there.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (echoes his line) I prefer to improvise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cute. Real cute. Lara drops to her knees, inspects the area where the ston meet the floor slab. Dodge joins her, still skeptical.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: This stairwell appears to move, so all we need to find is the trigger. Dodge looks around at the vast ruins.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Sure. No problem.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (ignores him) What is the preeminent symbol in Incan culture?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: That would be the sun.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Very good, Nathaniel. And can you tell me what the most important date on the Incan calendar is? Dodge rolls his eyes but answers:

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Inti Rami, the summer solstice. Unfortunately, that's eight months from now. Lara keeps circling the stairs, her passion and concentra growing with each step, as her mind hones in on the solution.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: The translation said: "On Inti Rami, the last rays of the sun will walk a stairway from the stars. (beat) I'll wager you my 50% in gold that the trigger appears at sunset.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: That gives us less than an hour to figure out how to replicate the Rami sun. Lara removes her MIRROR SHADES from her backpack.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Easy. All I need are your shades.

dialogues.speaker: CU
dialogues.text: Which is captured in one of Lara's mirrored lenses.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: According to my calculations...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FIND Lara seated atop a section of ruins with her LAPTOP working on an sophisticated ASTRONOMICAL PROGRAM.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: ..we need to compensate for a declination of the sun by approximately 13%.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (sarcastic) I was thinking the exact same thing. Dodge plays with the handful of FOUR MIRRORED LENSES remo their shades, watching them sparkle in the sun.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: That means the first one needs to be about three more feet to your right. Dodge plants the first "mirror" in a crevasse facing the

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: So I'm curious, Lara, why're you doing this? What're you looking for?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: I told you. I promised Darby I'd see this through.  (beat; re: mirrors) The second one gets reversed about ten feet that way.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: It's an honorable reason. But it's also bullshit.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Excuse me?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: This isn't about some map. Or a friend. Or even the Black Veil. This is your life. I can see it in your eyes, everything I used to be. You're a professional -- beyond a professional. You're prepared for everything --

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (interrupts) -- you can never be prepared for everything. (beat; re: mirrors) Third one goes atop that fountain.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: So why do you do it? I get the sense you don't need the money. Hell, I get the sense you don't need anything. Or anyone. Well, besides this Karak guy.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: I needed you, didn't I?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Yeah, but it really killed you to say so, didn't it? Lara can't meet his gaze, so she returns to her laptop.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Okay, we don't have much time left. The fourth mirror goes --

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (interrupts)  -- Forget all this crap for a minute! Dodge moves closer to Lara, determined to crack her shell

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look, I agreed to get you up here, and I've done that. If I quit now, I've already earned my 50%. If I go underground with you looking for the Black Veil, how does that change our deal?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: If it's about the money, Dodge, you can have the entire lot. 100%. Dodge crouches in front of her. Eyes fixed on hers.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: I'm not talking about money, Lara. I want to know what happens with us? For the first time Lara's trademark poise is gone. A beat

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (hesitates) I guess this is one of those situations I'm not prepared for. Finally, Dodge rises with a resigned sigh.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: You know what...? Neither am I. (long pause) So what about this fourth mirror? Relieved to be back to business, Lara doesn't miss a beat

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Reverse it, and ten feet to the left. As Dodge places the final mirror:

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: How do we know it's working anyway?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: We'll know. In less than a minute. Lara and Dodge watch the sun slowly sinking beneath the h the last rays of sunshine glint off the first lens it bou light back to the second lens...then reflects it back to lens...and finally the fourth.

dialogues.speaker: AT THE STAIRS
dialogues.text: The beam of sunlight appears to "walk" down the stairs as sets deeper into the horizon. When it reaches the bottom step. happens.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Obviously I'm missing something.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Obviously. Lara has circled around the back of the steps where she p that the beam of sunlight has pierced a SMALL IMPERFECTIO of the stair's stone seams...sending a thin beam of light al across the ruins to an ORNAMENTU STONE protruding from th remains of a TEMPLE. And then the beam disappears. The su

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (inspects imperfection) That crack? That's the big secret?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Haven't you ever noticed there are no imperfections in Incan masonry? Lara starts jogging over to the collapsed temple, while D at the stairs, taking a seat.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That crack is there by design. Lara reaches the ornamental stone, and as Dodge watches f stairs, Lara gives the stone a once-over, then pushes it hands... THE STAIRS RUMBLE TO LIFE BENEATH DODGE! He jumps from hi as: a PASSAGE opens at the base of the stairs and the entire  corkscrews down into the ground. Dodge looks incredulously across the ruins at Lara.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lucky you didn't take my wager.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They descend the Stairway from the Stars, which empties i beautiful, dome-shaped FOYER encircled with 12 GOLD PLAQU representing the gods associated with each month of the y trap in sight.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Amazing. Leading the way with a FLASHLIGHT, Dodge excitedly steps the foyer, but Lara grabs him firmly by the arm:

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Not so fast. Where Dodge's next step would have been, Lara fires her g invisible PRESSURE PAD to trigger a maniacal flurry of ac

dialogues.speaker: BLADES
dialogues.text: shoot from each gold plaque, criss-crossing the room and disappearing back into a different plaque.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Thank God I didn't find this place ten years ago. I wpuld've been filletted right out of the gate.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (serious) And you still might. Somewhere down here is the Inca's most sacred and well-guarded shrine. You want to come with me, I've got to know you aren't going to get us killed.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (interrupts; insulted) -- Hey, I'm not that rusty. You just worry about yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Works for me. Lara moves past Dodge, wielding her own FLASHLIGHT as she them both across the foyer to a long, dark and narrow STONE PA with a DOORWAY at the other end.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: See these floor tiles? A favorite Incan trick.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Floor collapses. I've seen that. Lara fires bullets at several floor tiles. Nothing happen

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: No, the Incans were smarter than that. The first set of traps is a misdirect. Designed to make you think every trap can be pre- sprung. (hands Dodge flashlight) Hold this. Keep it ahead of me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara walks slowly out onto floor tiles, eyes scanning the harmless-seeming periphery.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: The unsuspecting tomb raider walks confidently onto the tiles never even seeing what hit him... She gestures for Dodge to shine the flashlight at the cei

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ...because he forgot to look up -- --SLUURSH! A MASSIVE BLADE drops down like a guillotine f ceiling...forcing Lara to somersault forward, nearly clea the hits just keep coming -- -- SWUUUSH! SWUUUSH! TWO CIRCULAR BLADES scissor simultan from the walls nearly beheading Lara, who dives to the ground to safety just as -- -- CRUNCH! CRUNCH! CRUNCH! BOULDERS drop like deadly hail around Lara, collapsing the floor tiles and revealing SPI beneath them. Lara sprints across the rapidly checkerboar to the DOOR at the end of the room...but the door is only a Lara reacts as -- -- THWIT-THWIT-THWIT-THWIT! DARTS shoot from the faux doo prompting Lara to instinctively SIDE-FLIP to safety...but only for because -- -- CRAAAACK! THE FLOOR TILES give way beneath her, just a spots an ELEVATED PASSAGEWAY. She leaps for and barely catches the passage. While Lara hangs there: Dodge watches in awe as: THE ENTIRE ROOM RESTORES ITSELF incredible seconds! Floor tiles hinge back into place, bl disappear back into walls, etc. Not even any boulders. With a tremendous show of strength, Lara now pulls hersel a HANCSTAND on the lip, then gracefully executes a WALKOVER passageway. Breathing hard, but utterly composed, she tur and gestures to Dodge.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Your turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara walks slowly through the flat passage, FLASHLIGHT in Behind her we can hear Dodge's EXCLAMATIONS as he makes his way last set of traps. Finally, Dodge catches up with Lara, p

dialogues.speaker: DART
dialogues.text: from his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Okay, so maybe I am a little rusty. Where Dodge is masking his nerves with glibness, Lara's f grows more intense as she moves closer to her prize.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're still alive. That's all that matters -- (gestures) -- Stop! Don't move. Lara can just barely make out the end of the elevated pas before them: A SMALL PIT.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: What is it now?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: That pit ahead. Not a good sign. She turns back, flashlight illuminating the entrance thro they entered; they are at about the midway point of the p Removing a BULLET from her gun, Lara drops the ammo on th where it starts rolling towards the pit. Rolling and roll indicating an incline which is not at all evident inside passageway.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: How's that possible? WE HEAR the bullet still rolling away in the dark.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: The walls. They're an optical illusion. Makes us feel like we're on level ground so we don't expect the massive boulder that's going to crush us.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (suddenly worried) And what exactly triggers that? Before Lara can answer the bullet stops rolling, sounding an ominous PING!

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Oh dear. THE PASSAGEWAY RUMBLES as a MASSIVE BOULDER drops down fr ceiling about 20 yards behind them. As Lara and Dodge spr towards  the pit -- -- TWO HANGING BLADES PENDULUM DOWN IN THEIR PATH swingin sync and making passage through them impossible. While Dodge l in mounting fear at the oncoming boulder, Lara studies the s blades.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You take the near, I'll take the far!

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: What!? Lara LEAPS at the far blade...grabbing hold of the WOODEN which it pendulums! Clinging safely above the blade she c close to the ceiling as humanly possible.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Better get the rust out, Dodge! Dodge takes one quick look back at the onrolling boulder fills about 3/4 of the passageway) before he leaps! Clinging on near blade's wooden stem just like Lara -- -- SAAAAAAAAAAASH!!! The boulder plows through both blade snapping them off at the wooden stems inches below Lara and Dodge' They both drop safely down to the passageway as the boulder co rolling into the pit.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Having fun yet?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (surprises himself) Yeah. As a matter of fact I am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They climb from the pit up to ledge overlooking a rectang temple filled with water. The only visible way across the temple GOLDEN DOORWAY on the other side -- is via 10 VERTICAL P spaced dauntingly apart. Lara's FLASHLIGHT reveals the WATER IS with unseen menace.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Looks inviting. Lara cracks a FLARE open and drops it into the water -- -- A GIANT BARRACUDA surfaces to swallow the flare whole!

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Barracuda.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Very hungry barracuda. (beat) No margin for error here. Lara takes a few steps back, runs and LEAPS to the first pulling herself up on top... A TALL FLAME ignites from the top center of the pillar! ( pillars ignite as well creating an eerie, deadly spectacl Instinctively, Lara BACKFLIPS...executing a HALF TWIST in she lunges back for the ledge -- -- Dodge grabs Lara by the arm as she comes up short! Dan the edge by one hand -- feet skimming the water -- Lara n problems immediately: 1) Her shorts are ON FIRE!, and; 2)

dialogues.speaker: BARRACUDA
dialogues.text: jumps from the water for one of her legs, which she daint at the knee to avoid dismemberment. Lara quickly scales the wall with Dodge's help, who galla out the flames on her shorts.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lucky for me you were here.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Just trving to earn my 50%. Lara and Dodge both turn and survey the situation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hard to improvise the impossible.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Nothing's impossible. Theoretically. Dodge watches Lara pace back and forth on the ledge, her attacking the problem at hand.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If I wasn't out of winch cable we could easily traverse this room.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Maybe if we can figure a way to put the fires out...

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Yes, but those jumps can only be made with a running start. After the first pillar you're stuck -- -- Lara snaps her fingers with an idea.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Got it! She shines her flashlight on the base of the first pillar

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: See the erosion at the water line? Same thing on all the pillars.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: (follows her) You can't be thinking...

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: -- It's the only way. But it'll require our combined body weight. Lara offers Dodge her hand.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You still with me, Dodge?

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: For better or worse. Dodge takes her hand in hers. Together they step to the ledge. Exchange a last glance at one another...then run a JUMP for the first pillar! They both hit and grab onto the edge of the pillar simult Their weight has caused the pillar to sway back and forth and forth...until -- CRAAAAAAACK! The pillar breaks at the base...sending the falling forward as Lara and Dodge scramble to stay astrid -- CRAAAAAACK! The first pillar strikes the second pillar it at the base...sending it falling forward into the third p so on, and so on. Like dominoes all the way to the golden do path of pillars has been laid out for them across the dan waters, with all the flames extinguished.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: You know, I think we make a pretty decent team.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Entering through the golden archway, Lara and Dodge disco stunning SHRINE built in the middle of a massive subterra cavern, partially collapsed from years of earthquakes.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: I don't know about you, but my heart is pounding -- I feel like a kid again.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: I know exactly how you feel. Lara starts CRACKING FLARES, tossing them around the cave ROCKS and DEBRIS litter the periphery.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE SHRINE
dialogues.text: As they both climb the steps leading up to the center of shrine, Lara notices one of the outer shrine columns is literally under  the weight of collapsed ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Only one stone bends like this... Dodge is thinking exactly the same thing as he polishes t column with his shirt sleeve.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Gold. With her flashlight, Lara points out how their boots have subtle IMPRESSIONS in the shrine floor. Dropping down to his kne furiously scrubs away the dirt.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It's all gold... (looks around shrine) The floors. The walls. The ceilings. He stands, awe-struck by his incomparable surroundings.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Maybe it's not El Dorado but this... this is what I always imagined finding. Something beyond description...beyond belief.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: I have a feeling it gets better... Lara moves into the center of the shrine to a GOLDEN STAT (the sun god) holding a crude-cut obsidian BOWL atop an o pedestal. (This is the same object depicted in Manco's bu chamber.)

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Here it is. The Black Veil.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Not much to look at. What does it do?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Every culture has legends about a magical device which turns ordinary metals into gold -- The Crow's Head, The Philosopher's Stone. But the  stories are usually cautionary tales about the evils of greed.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Time to throw caution to the wind. With sparkling eyes, Dodge gratifies his long-dormant Pro fever. He pulls off a cheap SILVER RING and drops it into Veil.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Legends say to make it work, you must clasp the bowl with both hands and visualize the desired transformation -- the Veil's magic is powered by the soul of the user. Dodge clasps the bowl as instructed, staring down intentl silver ring. When nothing happens after 20 seconds, Dodge embarrassedly hands the bowl to Lara.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: You try it. I still owe the IRS back taxes so technically my soul's in hock. Clasping the bowl, Lara stares at the ring and the magic instantly: the ring melts to liquid...boiling furiously a mystical BLACK SMOKE froths over the cup, veiling the transmutatio REACTION SHOTS: Both Lara and Dodge watch on in wonder as The smoke magically dissipates and LIQUID GOLD remains wh once was silver! As Dodge pours it out:

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I don't believe my friggin' eyes. A jubilant grin consuming his face, Dodge raises his fist triumph and shouts to the heavens:

dialogues.speaker: YEEESSSSSSSSSSSSSSS
dialogues.text: Ecstatic, Dodge grabs a surprised Lara in a bear hug, spi around like they just won the lottery.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're rich, Lara! We're filthy rich! As Dodge's euphoria dies down they stop spinning. Now Dod Lara find their faces mere inches apart. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I forgot. You're already rich.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (sincere) It's all yours, Dodge. Truly. You deserve this. Lara's statement inexplicably chills Dodge, who pulls bac

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: That's sweet. But let's get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (bemused) I don't understand. What's the rush?

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: My sentiments exactly... REVEAL - MALVERN and his men (Larsen plus four) surroundi shrine from all sides. When Lara rapidly draws her pistols the A pump their 12 gauges. A standoff.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We've got so much catching up to do. Malvern moves up the steps towards Lara, fully intrigued unconventional woman of beauty, brains and balls.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: First of all, Ms. Croft, much thanks for working out those nasty traps. We couldn't have made it without you. (beat; cheap shot) Can't say the same thing about Daddy. Lara's eyes narrow with spite at the mention of her fathe  picks up on Lara's emotions but doesn't understand.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Some people, like me, earn their fortunes with sweat and blood. Ms. Croft here took a little shortcut. Left her Daddy to die in the Himalayas. Inherited forty million dollars at the age of 16. Gives most of it away to charity these days to appease her guilty conscience -- -- Lara snaps! She runs for Malvern...but Larsen brutally CLOTHESLINES her with his shotgun! Catching Lara under th sending her legs out from under her.

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: (smiles) Must've hit a hot spot. Dodge kneels beside Lara to help her up.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Alright Malvern. You've had your laughs. Now leave her alone.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: I've got much bigger scores to settle than some British bimbo who thinks she's bloody James Bond. (beat; to Larsen) Get the Veil. As Larsen grabs the Veil from the statue, Lara gets back on her feet with Dodge's help.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Flooding the world's gold market isn't going to solve anything.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: (chuckles) Just like a lousy Brit to think so small. Larsen delivers the Black Veil to Malvern.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I didn't hire Erikson to find me gold. That's the least of my  interests.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: You got what you want, Malvern. Why don't you get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: No. I think I'd rather watch you kill the little bitch first.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Bullshit. That wasn't part of the deal.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (realizes) You sold me out. You led them here. Dodge, feeling the pressure now, tries to explain to Lara Unexpectedly, drops to one knee.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: They were going to kill you back in the village if you didn't tell them what you found in Manco's tomb. I knew you wouldn't talk...

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: ..unless I thought I could trust you.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: I just didn't want to see you get hurt.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: And I thought chivalry was dead. Lara ROUNDHOUSE PUNCHES Dodge with such force he

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: (mocks Dodge) Oooh, that's gotta hurt.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: You want me dead, Malvern? Do it yourself.  Malvern smiles at the challenge, considering the notion.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: No! I'll do it... (rises; wipes blood from his lip) Only if you let me live. Lara stares at him incredulously. Malvern crosses his arm

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: Impress me. Do it with your hands. Dodge nods to Malvern, then turns to face Lara. She glare defiantly as he steps right up to her. Hands at his side, mouths a single word to Lara: "Run." As Lara's surprised eyes ac the improvised plan... Dodge draws his BOWIE KNIFE from the sheath on his belt a fluid motion, does a half turn and FLINGS THE BLADE right Malvern's heart! But Malvern's reflexes are fast enough to flinch, the blade in his shoulder instead! BA-BOOOM! Larsen plugs Dodge with a shotgun blast. But La already on the flee -- -- BA-BOOOM! BA-BOOOM! BA-BOOOM! The Aussies unload their into the shadowy periphery as Lara dodges back and forth the rocks and debris...only intermittently illuminated by the blasts. And then she's gone. Malvern grimaces as he extracts the blade from his should grit, he moves over to Dodge, who lays on the ground hold bloody gut.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT' D)
dialogues.text: I believe this is yours. Malvern returns the favor and FLINGS the bowie knife into shoulder. While Dodge writhes in pain, Malvern stalks dow shrine steps, greeted by Larsen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girl's hiding somewhere. Should we keep looking?

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: Don't bother. Bury them both.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: CU - A GRENADE LAUNCHER ejects a series of grenades. We a

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE SHRINE
dialogues.text: Larsen is wielding the big gun. Grinning large as he watc MULTIPLE BLASTS destabilize the entire underground cavern off the first of many subterranean EARTHQUAKES. Impressed with the destruction he's wrought, Larsen hurri Malvern and the other Aussies waiting at the golden archw Larsen blows shut with a final grenade! FIND Lara emerging from behind a rock. Venturing out when tremor stops, moving amidst the crumbling cavern...jogging at fi then running when she sees Dodge inside the shrine, pulling th knife from his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE SHRINE
dialogues.text: Lara drops to her knees beside Dodge, who is battling dea inspects his abdominal wound with deep concern.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: We've got to get you out of here. Back on her feet, Lara doesn't listen to Dodge's speech; focused eyes scan the periphery searching for escape.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Don't worry about me. Just get yourself out of here. At the edge of the shrine Lara spots a glimmer of hope...

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: The BENT GOLD COLUMN she saw earlier now slopes up to a in the ceiling. It's a tight squeeze but STARS can be seen a way out.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lara rushes back to Dodge and starts to drag him.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Forget it, Lara. I got what I deserve. The emotions of watching someone die in her arms is too m Lara as her long-suppressed emotions rise to the surface.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: You can still make it, Dodge! Don't you dare give up on me now! Lara keeps dragging Dodge, just as she dragged her father the shrine. She's reverting back to that defining moment in h trying to convince herself:

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It's gonna be fine...gonna be fine. ANOTHER TREMOR ROCKS THE CAVERN! Tearing the shrine in ha forming a LARGE FISSURE between Lara, Dodge and the escap Dodge grabs onto Lara's arm for emphasis:

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Listen to me, Lara. I can think of worse places to die. I mean, the last thing I'll see is all this gold. Sensing his end, Lara's desperate denial begins to crumbl walls around her. She kneels beside him again.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Don't leave me, Dodge. Please. Lara's eyes are welling with tears. Dodge reaches a hand face, tries to wipes away thirteen years of pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can beat every trap there is, Lara. But sometimes you can't beat death. No matter how good you are. They kiss. Like they wanted to the first time they met. A passionate confession, a cruel hint at what could have been. A tende that leaves Lara's lip quivering.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: See it through, Lara. For Darby... and for me. Lara nods her acceptance of the challenge. Brusquely rubb her tears, Lara summons her inner strength and walks to the e fissure.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: She is staring at a jump much like the one she had to mak monastery, only further. And this time the lower ground o other side is much less forgiving than snow.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lara looks back at Dodge, some doubt still clouding her f walls continue to crumble all around them.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: I don't think I can do this, Dodge!

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Sure you can. (beat; the drill) Favorite movie. Lara manages a slight smile despite her anguish.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Anything with Buster Keaton.

dialogues.speaker: DODGE
dialogues.text: Good answer. Dodge watches as Lara moves away from the fissure's edge, her steps back to him. Exhaling slowly, Lara gathers her fall to her side; a gymnast before her routine. The caver to SHAKE & RUMBLE with induced seismic activity. But Lara st focused. And with quick, precision steps...she sprints for the edg leaps... ...soaring over the chasm...landing on the other side and a perfect TUCK & ROLL. A relieved smile alights her face as back for Dodge's approval...

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: The entire SHRINE has collapsed. Dodge is gone.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lara stares down into the LAVA FILLED abyss for a second, that moment in the Himalayas...but there's no time for re another VIOLENT TREMOR strikes... Lara runs for the BENT GOLD COLUMN and, as the walls lite around her, she scrambles up the column to her escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara barely squeezes up through the surface FISSURE just Malvern's helicopter -- battling the fierce CROSSWINDS -- flees the heading for the distant Pacific ocean. Without hesitation Lara sprints for the edge of the plate reclips a carabiner to the guide line she used earlier. L disappears over the edge. And the chase is on.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: CU - A MAP showing international shipping lanes. A straig from Peru to Australia has been highlighted. We are:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara, now dressed in a scuba suit, has one eye on the sky on Dodge's shipping map. In the distance, Lara can just make outlines of a shipping vessel all lit up on the ocean. Pu her

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (THROUGH GOGGLES)
dialogues.text: The night-vision filter gives the world a GREEN GLOW. The

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: to the ship, where we see Malvern's WHALE LOGO and the wo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The seaplane circles around high in the air, then sets do rolling waves a mile or so ahead of Malvern's ship. A bea Lara dives from the plane into the water. WE HEAR the shipping vessel approaching in the distance, accompanied by oncoming lights. A HORN blares.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Aussie CAPTAIN points out to Larsen the seaplane direc ship's path.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: I can stop us or ram it, but it's too late to turn at this speed.

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: Better stop us. Seconds after the Captain initiates a speed decrease, Lar

dialogues.speaker: WALKIE-
dialogues.text: TALKIE squawks to life.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (over walkie) Why the hell're we stopping?

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: There's a friggin' seaplane in our way. Looks like Dodge's.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (over walkie)  Search the ship. No one gets below. Or we're all dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hull of Malvern's ship cuts through the black waters. watching as the ship passes slowly by...then she makes a grab onto the ship's ANCHOR CHAIN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara climbs aboard and creeps around the lower deck past HUEY HELICOPTER parked on the heliport. Lara is on full a both guns drawn, but curiously there doesn't seem to be a topside. So she finds a HATCH providing access to the lev

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara quietly searches the corridors for signs of life. Su she presses her back against the wall... CLANK-CLANK-CLANK. The sounds of footsteps on the metal f heading her way. Lara ducks into a side room...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara looks around a room filled with a grisly variety of

dialogues.speaker: BLADES
dialogues.text: AND CHOPPING EQUIPMENT used for Malvern's defunct whaling Lara's nose wrinkles, both with disgust and the lingering Lara watches an AUSSIE GUARD pass, then she exits quickly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Aussie Guard doesn't see Lara creep up behind him.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Howdy mate. The Aussie spins to see Lara's guns pointed at him.

dialogues.speaker: AUSSIE GUARD
dialogues.text: No, no! Don't shoot!

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Fair enough. Lara PISTOL-WHIPS the guard, who hits the deck, out cold. quickly searches him...but finds that his holster is curiously em

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Descending a ladder, Lara finds herself deep in the bowel ship. As she peers around a corner:

dialogues.speaker: LARA
