dialogues.text: Two people in HAZ-MAT suits walk down the corridor. They room via a temporary AIR LOCK constructed around a HEAVILY REI

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Lara hurries to the door. On the wall is a conspicuously emblem: the universal symbol for radiation. Lara peers into the r through the small door PORTHOLE, but the glass is FROSTED; Lara c only silhouettes and movement... Until the dark shape of a haz-mat helmet looms into view! ducks behind the heavy door as it opens...and it swings right i Lara lets out an involuntary GRUNT. The HAZ-MAT AUSSIE spins around, alerted. Lara greets him drawn. The Aussie waves frantically:

dialogues.speaker: HAZ-MAT AUSSIE
dialogues.text: (muffled by helmet) No, no guns! Please!

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Well isn't this a switch. Lara holsters her guns. The Haz-Mat Aussie visibly relaxe is when Lara delivers a vicious KICK to the groin. After the doubles over, Lara removes his helmet and drops him where  with an UPPERCUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara emerges from a room wearing the Aussie's haz-mat sui heads for the REINFORCED DOOR, entering like she belongs. But L prepared for the sight that greets her inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room where the ship's catch was gutted, sliced and pr has been converted into a makeshift factory floor. Lara discr stashes her GUNS behind a shipping crate. On one side, two haz-mat-suited TECHS delicately load MET

dialogues.speaker: CONTAINERS
dialogues.text: with radiation symbols on them into heavily insulated SHI CRATES. Another tech logs the progress into COMPUTERS. Once the c secure, they are rolled by dolly into a nearby COLD-STORA Three more techs are queued up in front of a clear, two-f plexi-glass WINDOW. Behind this air-lock divider is Malve it's impossible for Lara to see exactly what he's up to. moves in for a closer view... Lara joins the line, careful to avoid the looks of the ot technicians milling about the room. While she waits, Lara over a tech's shoulder at his computer: CU - COMPUTER SCREEN: Purchase orders, shipping manifests is selling something to private buyers around the globe for more than the market price of a whale. Finding herself next in line, Lara sees for the first tim on the other side of the plexiglass, his arms encased in pro

dialogues.speaker: WALL-
dialogues.text: GLOVES, cupping with both hands the BLACK VEIL on Lara's the wall. The tech in front of her places a piece of SCRAP IRON in Black Veil, and as Malvern concentrates BLACK SMOKE billows fro obsidian cup. As the smoke dissipates, Malvern pours a GR into the tech's CONTAINER.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (eyes wide; sotto) Plutonium. Lara finally arrives at the front of the line. Malvern lo and moist, the process clearly draining him. He waits for drop her scrap iron into the Veil...but she doesn't have any.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: What the hell're you doing? Malvern finally recognizes Lara through her face plate. L answers by grabbing the Black Veil from Malvern's gloved hands. A hurries for the reinforced door, Malvern yanks his arms f gloves and hits and INTERCOM button.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (over intercom) Stop her! Get the Veil! As the techs realize what's going on, Lara reaches the sh crates where she stashed her guns. Suddenly, all activity ceases

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (over intercom) She won't shoot. One stray bullet and we're all at ground zero.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Better us than the rest of the world. The conviction in Lara's voice gives pause to Malvern.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: (over intercom) Everyone out. Now. The room empties out quickly through the reinforced door. joins  him behind the plexiglass in the view room.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: What's the point to all this, Malvern? End of the world? That your game? As he speaks, Malvern hits some buttons on a CONTROL PANE the view room -- we can't see exactly what he's doing.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: (over intercom) The world's gonna end sooner than later, Ms. Croft. Figure I'll go out on top when it does. But we need you to put down your gun now.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Dump all the plutonium overboard and then we'll talk. Larsen whispers something to Malvern, who smiles.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: (over intercom) I've got a better idea. Let's talk about one of the precautionary measures we've taken here... Lara looks around, instantly suspicious.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (over intercom) In a radiation-filled environment you must be able to remove all the air in two minutes. Lara reacts as her haz-mat suit starts to CINCH to her bo Malvern has initiated the air removal process.

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ever seen a fish out of water, flapping around? It's not a pretty sight. You can see the panic in their eyes...until they start popping out their sockets. Larsen waves at Lara, sucking in his lips to resemble a Panicking, Lara points a gun at him and fires! But nothin Lara points both her guns at the plutonium -- CLICK. CLIC

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (over intercom) Did I forget to mention that with no oxygen your gun can't fire? Larsen and Malvern share a cruel LAUGH inside the view ro

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: G'Day, Ms. Croft. As Lara's face plate fogs up and her body stiffens, the g from her hands. Staggering around the room, Lara stumbles inex into the COLD-STORAGE LOCKER, which she closes behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara is now out of sight from the view room. Larsen shoot a confused look.

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: What's the hell's she doing now?

dialogues.speaker: MALVERN
dialogues.text: British pride. Doesn't want to give us the pleasure of watching her die. (then) Let's, get this ship moving again. We've got orders to fill. The two men exit the view room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara leans against the back wall of the locker, which is with CRATES OF STORED, SHIELDED PLUTONIUM. Her breathing extremely labored now, Lara slides down the a sitting position. Her eyes show the understandable panic through her veins. But then her eyes focus on the Black V hands, still filled with plutonium. With the last reserv strength she has, Lara closes her eyes and concentrates. BLACK SMO to billow from the Veil, sucked into the AIR VENTS overhead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (over intercom) Here's an interesting fact: with the amount of radiation presently soaking into your body, the rest of your journey to Australia will be a painful one indeed. Malvern sits up, slowly comprehending his predicament.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: First, you'll be overcome with nausea. Next comes the blood from every orifice -- very messy. Then out falls the hair, which in your case may be more of a blessing. And finally, if you're still alive, you go deaf, dumb and blind. Not necessarily in that order. (beat) G'Day. As Lara leaves, Malvern bangs furiously on the plexiglass he remembers a way out and heads for COLD STORAGE.

dialogues.text: Stripped back to her scuba outfit, Lara hurries up a ladd finds herself in the middle of an assortment of CRATES. Various indicate that the crates contain weapons and ammunition. a crate marked "DANGER: EXPLOSIVES!" Inside are a dozen SM

dialogues.text: BOXES marked "Plastique." Emptying one of the boxes, Lara the BLACK VEIL inside.

dialogues.text: (into walkie; whispers) Everybody port side. Now. FOLLOW LARA as she scampers along the shadowy deck, the M

As Larsen carefully lines up a shot with the harpoon gun. Lara RUNS AND SHOOTS with her single gun until all her bu spent. She keeps running for the Huey but -- -- AN AUSSIE GUARD appears in Lara's path with a SHOTGUN!

dialogues.text: End of the line, Missie. Just then, Larsen fires the harpoon gun! THE HARPOON flie Lara, trailing a thick STEEL CABLE. Lara sees it coming b Aussie Guard, so she SIDE-FLIPS with a HALF TWIST in the reversing her direction! The harpoon misses Lara by inches...but impales the Auss and sticks in a crate down on the lower surface deck!

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: Goddammit ! Larsen abandons the harpoon gun and takes chase on foot a Lara grabs up the Aussie's shotgun and cracks it open. Wi METALLIC BOX between her feet, Lara uses the V'd shotgun

dialogues.text: the harpoon's steel cable to the lower surface deck where is parked! RACK FOCUS on Malvern emerging from the lower levels.

dialogues.text: His sweaty face knotted with maniacal fury, Malvern stand other harpoon gun, one eye squinted on his target: the ri chopper -- -- KA-SHOOOOOOOOOP! The harpoon arcs through the night sk the landing struts! Malvern smiles a twisted smile as the Hue a fly on a string above him!

dialogues.text: Reel her in. One of the Aussies takes over the harpoon controls from M Now the hydraulic engines start to pull the chopper down towa ship!

dialogues.text: Abandoning the now useless controls, Lara reaches for the

dialogues.speaker: BOX
dialogues.text: ...but Larsen puts a boot hard down on her hand.

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN
dialogues.text: I read somewhere that British girls like it rough. Larsen viciously backhands Lara, who stumbles to her knee the cabin. Now armed with the metallic box, Larsen stands ove fully enjoying his position of power.

dialogues.speaker: LARSEN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tell you what. Beg for your life like Erikson did and I'll make it a quickie for you. Lara's eyes suddenly burn with a rage we haven't seen bef

dialogues.text: Malvern and the rest of the Aussie contingent stare up at circling helicopter...slowly being reeled in closer to the ship by Aussie controlling the harpoon gun!

dialogues.text: Lara and Larsen continue to slug it out inside the choppe lurches on the end of the harpoon line -- Lara goes tumbl against the wall. Larsen takes the opportunity to grab back the m box, which he raises above his head to smash in Lara's skull.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: You wanna know how British girls really like it? Larsen hesitates for just a second, allowing Lara to KIC the open side of the chopper.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: With us on top.

dialogues.text: The Huey has been pullea within 30' of the deck, so the f doesn't immediately kill Larsen, who smashes down into some SHIPP CRATES. Malvern and the other Aussies hurry down to the lower dec blood trickling from his mouth, Larsen holds up the metallic bo victorious grin despite the pain.

dialogues.text: I...I got the Veil.

dialogues.text: Lara cleverly maneuvers the chopper so that the steel cab around the Aussie at the controls of the harpoon gun...

dialogues.text: Malvern reaches down and takes the metallic box from Lars faint TICKING can be heard. A worried look crosses Malvern's fa opens the box to see Lara's ruse: CU - A BRICK OF PLASTIOUE rigged to blow in five seconds!

dialogues.text: The red flash fades to white, revealing A NUCLEAR MUSHRO up from the water. The Huey Helicopter flies right at the ca chased by the ENERGY WAVE. But Lara never looks back. And as the helicopter hits escape velocity, we;

dialogues.text: Bravo, boys. She kisses two fingers and applies the sentiment to each picture. Karak drives with one eye on Lara in the rear-view mirror

dialogues.speaker: KARAK
dialogues.text: I take it your trip was... rejuvenating?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Wonderfully so, Karak.

dialogues.speaker: KARAK
dialogues.text: Did you find what you were looking for? Lara thinks about this for a moment, then half-smiles.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Yes. (pause) Yes, I think I finally did.

dialogues.speaker: KARAK
dialogues.text: You haven't forgotten about your Aunt's cocktail party?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (instant dread) Is that tonight?

dialogues.speaker: KARAK
dialogues.text: (wry) You can run, Lara, but you can't hide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This impressive West End flat is peopled with ELDERLY MEN and AGING WOMEN draped in demure dresses and ostentatious jew Ev flits about, hosting a cocktail party for the upper crust British society. Suddenly, the din of vapid conversation drops a notch. Al especially male -- fall firmly upon: LARA crossing the room in black stiletto heels and a shee red dress that hides everything...and yet nothing. Oddly, she carrying a BRIEFCASE. As Lara confidently makes her way across the room, the se party- goers parts magically before her. Aunt Ev spots her and h over.

dialogues.speaker: EVELYN
dialogues.text: Lara! I'm so glad you could make it. And look at you -- that vacation did you a world of good.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: It was a brilliant suggestion, Aunt Ev. May we speak alone for a moment?

dialogues.speaker: EVELYN
dialogues.text: Yes, but only a moment. So many people to attend to, you know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lara and Evelyn enter a lushly-decorated sitting room. A from the hearth illuminates the room. Lara opens her brie pulls out a stack of LEGAL PAPERS.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: I've signed the paperwork, as promised.

dialogues.speaker: EVELYN
dialogues.text: How proud your mother would be, to see you filling her shoes so nicely.

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Oh, I almost forgot -- I brought you a little souvenir from my travels... She hands her aunt THE BLACK VEIL.

dialogues.speaker: EVELYN
dialogues.text: (hates it) You're so...thoughtful. As Evelyn walks around looking for a spot to place the Ve

dialogues.speaker: EVELYN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I just don't know what to do with all these knickknacks you give me. REVEAL almost every horizontal surface in the room is occ the incredible ARTIFACTS Lara has given her.

dialogues.speaker: EVELYN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Scions, daggers... Where in the world do you ever find these things?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Oh, here and there... Impatient, Evelyn finally crams the Black Veil in a lower hole, completely out of sight.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I would love to stay, but I have another very important engagement.

dialogues.speaker: EVELYN
dialogues.text: (ears perk up) Engagement? Who's the lucky fellow?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (deadpan; teases her) Actually, there are three of them. Off of Evelyn's confounded look, we;

dialogues.text: Her red dress hiked up, Lara sits on a stool between the Boys --Stuart, Liam & Wesley. They are all drinking from a pin ale.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: So how was your trip?

dialogues.speaker: LIAM
dialogues.text: What happened this time?

dialogues.speaker: WESLEY
dialogues.text: You nail any baddies?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: Such imaginations... Lara enjoys her beer as the TV above the bar broadcasts a

dialogues.speaker: REPORT
dialogues.text: over images of the blasted remains of Malvernis SHIPPING floating in ocean.

dialogues.speaker: NEWSCASTER
dialogues.text: ...officials are uncertain what initiated the nuclear blast, which fortunately was far enough from all major land masses to pose any threat of fallout... The Gadget Boys all turn in unison to stare at Lara.

dialogues.speaker: STUART
dialogues.text: That was you wasn't it?

dialogues.speaker: LARA
dialogues.text: (feigns indignation)  Let me remind you, I am a proper British girl. The Gadget Boys aren't sure what to believe as Lara finis beer in one big, unladylike swig.

dialogues.speaker: LARA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Most of the time anyway. Lara's sly smirk elicits smiles from the boys, as we;
